import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; // Verwenden Sie useNavigate anstelle von useHistory import { loginUser } from '../api'; // Importieren Sie die loginUser-Funktion aus der API function Login() { const [email, setEmail] = useState(''); const [password, setPassword] = useState(''); const navigate = useNavigate(); const handleSubmit = async (event) => { event.preventDefault(); try { const response = await loginUser({ email, password }); console.log('User logged in successfully:', response); navigate('/dashboard'); // Leiten Sie nach /dashboard um } catch (error) { console.error('Error logging in:', error); } }; return (

setPassword(e.target.value)} className="block w-full appearance-none rounded-md border border-gray-300 px-3 py-2 placeholder-gray-400 focus:border-blueCustom focus:outline-none focus:ring-blueCustom sm:text-sm" />
